sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"animate-scopes"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#animate-scopes"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Animate scopes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If you didn't add Views to your app through our `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/viewstools/docs/tree/master/UseViews"}}>{`use-views`}</MDXTag>{` command, you will need to add our animations library manually by running `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`yarn add @viewstools/animations`}</MDXTag>{` in the main folder of your project.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"add-animations-to-properties"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#add-animations-to-properties"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Add animations to properties`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Say we want to animate the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`width`}</MDXTag>{` of a simple button:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ButtonAnimatedWidth.gif","alt":"ButtonAnimatedWidth"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`Button Vertical
backgroundColor red
onClick <
width 100
Label Text
text Hi
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`First we need to add a condition (scope) to the Vertical. Animations
can be only triggered when the condition value changes (true/false):`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`Button Vertical
backgroundColor red
onClick <
width 100
when <isClicked
width 150
Label Text
text Hi
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Animations work on scopes and require base value on the base scope.
You can think of scopes as animation frames.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Base scope is always a starting frame and each scope defines next frame.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This wouldn't work (there is no width property on the base scope):`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`Button Vertical
## (base scope starts)
backgroundColor red
onClick <
## (base scope ends, isClicked scope starts)
when <isClicked
width 150
## (isClicked scope ends)
Label Text
text Hi
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Add name of the curve after the value to animate any animatable property.
We want to animate `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`width`}</MDXTag>{` after the button is clicked, so we add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`spring`}</MDXTag>{` after width's value in the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`isClicked`}</MDXTag>{` scope:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`ButtonAnimatedWidth Vertical
backgroundColor red
onClick <
width 100
when <isClicked
width 150 spring
Label Text
text Hi
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Here's the code auto-generated by the Morpher from the ButtonAnimatedWidth.view file.
`}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"ButtonAnimatedWidth.view.logic.js"}}>{`ButtonAnimatedWidth.view.logic.js`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"animation-curves"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#animation-curves"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Animation curves`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExAll.gif","alt":"EaseAll"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"spring"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#spring"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Spring`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/animationCurvesSpring.jpg","alt":"Spring curve"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Max `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`speed 40`}</MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`bounciness 40`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Syntax examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`width 150 spring`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`paddingLeft 20 spring bounciness 20`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`marginTop 10 spring bounciness 20 speed 20`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`translateY 10 spring bounciness 20 speed 20 delay 300`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Configuration examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExSpring1A.gif","alt":"Spring default"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExSpring2A.gif","alt":"Spring 2"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExSpring3a.gif","alt":"Spring 3"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExSpring4.gif","alt":"Spring 4"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExSpring5.gif","alt":"Spring 5"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"easein"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#easein"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`EaseIn`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`No maximum. Default duration 150.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Syntax examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`width 150 easeIn`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`paddingLeft 20 easeIn duration 300`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`translateX 20 easeIn duration 300 delay 300`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Configuration examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExEaseIn1.gif","alt":"EaseIn curve1"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExEaseIn2.gif","alt":"EaseIn curve2"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExEaseIn3.gif","alt":"EaseIn curve3"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"easeout"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#easeout"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`EaseOut`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`No maximum. Default duration 150.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Syntax examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`height 150 easeOut`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`left 20 easeOut duration 300`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`scale 20 easeOut duration 300 delay 300`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Configuration examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExEaseOut1.gif","alt":"EaseOut curve1"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExEaseOut2.gif","alt":"EaseOut curve2"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExEaseOut3.gif","alt":"EaseOut curve3"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"ease"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#ease"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Ease`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`No maximum. Default duration 150.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Syntax examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`rotate 150 ease`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`bottom 20 ease duration 300`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`translateY 20 ease duration 300 delay 300`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Configuration examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExEase1.gif","alt":"Ease curve1"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExEase2.gif","alt":"Ease curve2"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExEase3.gif","alt":"Ease curve3"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"linear"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#linear"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Linear`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`No maximum. Default duration 150.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Syntax examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`maxWidth 150 linear`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`right 20 linear duration 300`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`flexGrow 3 linear duration 300 delay 300`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Configuration examples:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExLinear1.gif","alt":"Linear curve1"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExLinear2.gif","alt":"Linear curve2"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ExLinear3.gif","alt":"Linear curve3"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"delay"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#delay"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Delay`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Add `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`delay`}</MDXTag>{` to any animated property with a milliseconds value, like in the examples above.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In the Hurray button we are delaying the padding's animation:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`paddingLeft 100 easeOut delay 500
paddingRight 100 easeOut delay 500
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/delay1.gif","alt":"Delay"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"list-of-all-animated-properties"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#list-of-all-animated-properties"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`List of all animated properties`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In general, all the numerical value properties can be animated.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"animatable-layout-props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#animatable-layout-props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Animatable Layout props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`width`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`height`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`maxWidth`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`maxHeight`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`minWidth`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`minHeight`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`flexGrow (wow!)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`bottom`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`top`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`left`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`right`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"animatable-spacing-props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#animatable-spacing-props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Animatable Spacing props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`All margins and paddings can be animated! Make something fancy !`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"animatable-color-props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#animatable-color-props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Animatable Color props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Animations work on color, backgroundColor, and opacity, including spring curves . Funky!`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/animationColorSpring.gif","alt":"Color Spring Animation"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"animatable-transform-props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#animatable-transform-props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Animatable Transform props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`scale`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`translateX`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`translateY`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`rotate`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"animatable-border-props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h3" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#animatable-border-props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Animatable Border props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`borderWidth`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`borderColor`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`all border radius props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`outlineColor`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`outlineWidth`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"combine-animated-properties"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#combine-animated-properties"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Combine animated properties`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can animate more than one property in a block, although you will get the best
results if you will use only one spring animation per block.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"../images/ButtonBounce.gif","alt":"ButtonBounce"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Here we are animating:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`scale`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`backgroundColor`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`paddingLeft`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`paddingRight`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`ButtonBounce Horizontal
onClick <
alignItems center
justifyContent center
paddingBottom 10
paddingLeft 20
paddingRight 20
paddingTop 10
borderTopLeftRadius 5
borderTopRightRadius 5
borderBottomLeftRadius 5
borderBottomRightRadius 5
backgroundColor #ffaa00
scale 1
when <isClicked
scale 1.5 spring bounciness 20
backgroundColor #00c276 linear
paddingLeft 100 easeIn
paddingRight 100 easeIn
Text
color #ffffff
fontFamily Montserrat
fontSize 18
fontWeight 400
text Click Me
when <isClicked
text Hurray!!!
fontSize 28 linear
fontFamily Lobster
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`As you can see the text also changes when condition `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`isClicked`}</MDXTag>{` get's toggled on.
Same goes for animations. You can animate many properties across blocks
and scopes.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Side note. Any interactive blocks need some sort of logic to make them fully functional.
Here's an example of the logic file we've used in our animated example. Save it together
with the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ButtonBounce.view`}</MDXTag>{` file.
`}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"ButtonBounce.view.logic.js"}}>{`ButtonBounce.view.logic.js`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"transitions-lists-loops-and-tools"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#transitions-lists-loops-and-tools"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Transitions, lists, loops, and Tools`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We still need to use JavaScript to animate transitions between views.
Here's an example of a function used in a logic file that does the trick for now.
Transitions and loops will be added to the next major release. `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We are also working on animating list's items. Here's an example of what's
possible today using Javascript in the logic file.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Views Tools beta will support props animations!`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"known-issues---work-in-progress"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#known-issues---work-in-progress"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Known issues - work in progress`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`There can be only one spring animation in the view`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`EaseInOut curve has a bug and currently doesn't work`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`delay on spring curves doesn't work`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Big thank you to `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@amymc`}</MDXTag>{` for the massive contribution!   `}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Reach out with questions via our `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://slack.viewsdx.com/"}}>{`Slack Questions Channel`}</MDXTag>{`.
Mention `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@tom`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@dario`}</MDXTag>{` to make sure that we get your notifications.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
